Name: Heart Pawn
Effect: (First Move)Trap: Choose a Piece and deal 1 damage to it

Name: Heart Rook
Effect: Trap: Search Your Burned Zone for a card that cost 2 or less material and place it into your hand

Name: Heart Bishop
Effect: Take: Restore 2 Health to your king

Name: Queen of Hearts
